refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The GtkAboutDialog offers a simple way to display information about a program like its logo, name, copyright, website and license. It is also possible to give credits to the authors, documenters, translators and artists who have worked on the program. An about dialog is typically opened when the user selects the About option from the Help menu. All parts of the dialog are optional.

About dialog often contain links and email addresses. GtkAboutDialog supports this by offering global hooks, which are called when the user clicks on a link or email address, see gtk_about_dialog_set_email_hook() and gtk_about_dialog_set_url_hook(). Email addresses in the authors, documenters and artists properties are recognized by looking for <user@host>, URLs are recognized by looking for http://url, with url extending to the next space, tab or line break.

When setting the website and email hooks for the GtkAboutDialog widget, you should remember that the order is important: you should set the hook functions before setting the website and email URL properties, like this:

informalexample.programlisting: gtk_about_dialog_set_url_hook (GTK_ABOUT_DIALOG (dialog), launch_url, NULL, NULL); gtk_about_dialog_set_website (GTK_ABOUT_DIALOG (dialog), app_url);

refsect1.para: Otherwise the GtkAboutDialog widget will not display the website and the email addresses as clickable.

To make constructing a GtkAboutDialog as convenient as possible, you can use the function gtk_show_about_dialog() which constructs and shows a dialog and keeps it around so that it can be shown again.

Note that GTK+ sets a default title of _("About %s") on the dialog window (where %s is replaced by the name of the application, but in order to ensure proper translation of the title, applications should set the title property explicitly when constructing a GtkAboutDialog, as shown in the following example:

refsect2.title: GtkAboutDialog
refsect2.para: The GtkAboutDialog struct contains only private fields and should not be directly accessed.

refsect2.title: gtk_about_dialog_get_name ()

warning.para: gtk_about_dialog_get_name has been deprecated since version 2.12 and should not be used in newly-written code. Use gtk_about_dialog_get_program_name() instead.

refsect2.para: Returns the program name displayed in the about dialog.

listitem.simpara: The program name. The string is owned by the about dialog and must not be modified.

refsect2.title: gtk_about_dialog_set_name ()

warning.para: gtk_about_dialog_set_name has been deprecated since version 2.12 and should not be used in newly-written code. Use gtk_about_dialog_set_program_name() instead.

refsect2.para: Sets the name to display in the about dialog. If this is not set, it defaults to g_get_application_name().

refsect2.title: gtk_about_dialog_get_program_name ()
refsect2.para: Returns the program name displayed in the about dialog.

listitem.simpara: The program name. The string is owned by the about dialog and must not be modified.

refsect2.title: gtk_about_dialog_set_program_name ()
refsect2.para: Sets the name to display in the about dialog. If this is not set, it defaults to g_get_application_name().

listitem.simpara: The version string. The string is owned by the about dialog and must not be modified.

refsect2.title: gtk_about_dialog_set_version ()
refsect2.para: Sets the version string to display in the about dialog.

listitem.simpara: The copyright string. The string is owned by the about dialog and must not be modified.

refsect2.title: gtk_about_dialog_set_copyright ()
refsect2.para: Sets the copyright string to display in the about dialog. This should be a short string of one or two lines.

listitem.simpara: The comments. The string is owned by the about dialog and must not be modified.

refsect2.title: gtk_about_dialog_set_comments ()
refsect2.para: Sets the comments string to display in the about dialog. This should be a short string of one or two lines.

listitem.simpara: The license information. The string is owned by the about dialog and must not be modified.

refsect2.title: gtk_about_dialog_set_license ()
refsect2.para: Sets the license information to be displayed in the secondary license dialog. If license is NULL, the license button is hidden.

refsect2.title: gtk_about_dialog_get_wrap_license ()
refsect2.para: Returns whether the license text in about is automatically wrapped.

listitem.simpara: TRUE if the license text is wrapped

refsect2.title: gtk_about_dialog_set_wrap_license ()
refsect2.para: Sets whether the license text in about is automatically wrapped.

listitem.simpara: The website URL. The string is owned by the about dialog and must not be modified.

refsect2.title: gtk_about_dialog_set_website ()
refsect2.para: Sets the URL to use for the website link.
Note that that the hook functions need to be set up before calling this function.

refsect2.title: gtk_about_dialog_get_website_label ()
refsect2.para: Returns the label used for the website link.

listitem.simpara: The label used for the website link. The string is owned by the about dialog and must not be modified.

refsect2.title: gtk_about_dialog_set_website_label ()
refsect2.para: Sets the label to be used for the website link. It defaults to the website URL.

listitem.simpara: the label used for the website link

refsect2.title: gtk_about_dialog_get_logo ()
refsect2.para: Returns the pixbuf displayed as logo in the about dialog.

listitem.simpara: the pixbuf displayed as logo. The pixbuf is owned by the about dialog. If you want to keep a reference to it, you have to call g_object_ref() on it.

refsect2.title: gtk_about_dialog_set_logo ()
refsect2.para: Sets the pixbuf to be displayed as logo in the about dialog. If it is NULL, the default window icon set with gtk_window_set_default_icon() will be used.

refsect2.title: gtk_about_dialog_get_logo_icon_name ()
refsect2.para: Returns the icon name displayed as logo in the about dialog.

listitem.simpara: the icon name displayed as logo. The string is owned by the dialog. If you want to keep a reference to it, you have to call g_strdup() on it.

refsect2.title: gtk_about_dialog_set_logo_icon_name ()
refsect2.para: Sets the pixbuf to be displayed as logo in the about dialog. If it is NULL, the default window icon set with gtk_window_set_default_icon() will be used.

refsect2.title: gtk_show_about_dialog ()
refsect2.para: This is a convenience function for showing an application's about box. The constructed dialog is associated with the parent window and reused for future invocations of this function.

listitem.simpara: transient parent, or NULL for none
the name of the first property
value of first property, followed by more properties, NULL-terminated

refsect2.title: The "artists" property
refsect2.para: The people who contributed artwork to the program, as a NULL-terminated array of strings. Each string may contain email addresses and URLs, which will be displayed as links, see the introduction for more details.

refsect2.title: The "authors" property
refsect2.para: The authors of the program, as a NULL-terminated array of strings. Each string may contain email addresses and URLs, which will be displayed as links, see the introduction for more details.

refsect2.title: The "comments" property
refsect2.para: Comments about the program. This string is displayed in a label in the main dialog, thus it should be a short explanation of the main purpose of the program, not a detailed list of features.

refsect2.title: The "documenters" property
refsect2.para: The people documenting the program, as a NULL-terminated array of strings. Each string may contain email addresses and URLs, which will be displayed as links, see the introduction for more details.

refsect2.title: The "license" property
refsect2.para: The license of the program. This string is displayed in a text view in a secondary dialog, therefore it is fine to use a long multi-paragraph text. Note that the text is only wrapped in the text view if the "wrap-license" property is set to TRUE; otherwise the text itself must contain the intended linebreaks.

refsect2.title: The "logo" property
refsect2.para: A logo for the about box. If this is not set, it defaults to gtk_window_get_default_icon_list().

refsect2.title: The "logo-icon-name" property
refsect2.para: A named icon to use as the logo for the about box. This property overrides the logo property.

refsect2.title: The "program-name" property
refsect2.para: The name of the program. If this is not set, it defaults to g_get_application_name().

refsect2.title: The "translator-credits" property
refsect2.para: Credits to the translators. This string should be marked as translatable. The string may contain email addresses and URLs, which will be displayed as links, see the introduction for more details.

refsect2.title: The "website" property
refsect2.para: The URL for the link to the website of the program. This should be a string starting with "http://.

refsect2.title: The "website-label" property
refsect2.para: The label for the link to the website of the program. If this is not set, it defaults to the URL specified in the website property.

refsect2.title: The "wrap-license" property
refsect2.para: Whether to wrap the text in the license dialog.
